name: Weiguo Wang (王伟国)
description:
Biography: I'm a Ph.D. student at Tsinghua University, and now working in the [System and Ubiquitous Networking Group (SUN)](http://tns.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/sun/), advised by [Prof. Yuan He](http://www.greenorbs.org/people/heyuan). I received my B.S. degree from UESTC in 2018. My research interests includes Wireless Sensing, Mobile Computing, and Acoustic Localization.
E-Mail: wwg18@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn;   wangwg1996@qq.com
